entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 4:55 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: E 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with rain early this evening. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the morning then light early in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:54 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
